metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20567 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In pppol2tp_create of l2tp_ppp.c, there is a possible use after free due toa race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege withSystem execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-186777253References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
